about_the_game:
Harvey: The Sleeper is a fast-paced arena shooter roguelike game! Arm yourself, enhance your abilities, and face relentless waves of enemies. Packed with intense action and strategic choices, this adventure will push your reflexes to the limit.

Each new dream is a gateway to a unique world. Be prepared to encounter increasingly challenging enemy waves, explore diverse and vibrant environments, and discover new weapons that redefine your playstyle. The ever-changing dreamscapes ensure that every run feels fresh and unpredictable. Will you face a never-before-seen enemy or stumble upon a game-changing weapon? The infinite variety of dreams guarantees new surprises and challenges with every playthrough.

With random abilities and endless combinations to experiment with, can you help Harvey awaken from the dream? Quick reflexes and smart decisions are your only keys to survival. Escape the depths of slumber—if you dare!
